ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you spoken to tech support about this? They have an online chat from their website. You have to fill out a guestbook looking thingy before entering
ygData.messageBody:
Have you spoken to tech support about this?
They have an online chat from their website. You have to fill out a
guestbook looking thingy before entering though.
They want your system specs and everything.
You may have to resort to going to the chat.
luv,
-Su


> Hey All,
> I just reinstalled directx 8.1 and updated my video card to the latest
> driver. Nothing happened! My character's face still gets all messed up
> whenever I zone. The picture of my character in the inventory is pure
black.
> And even when I'm at the character selection screen my character's face's
> are all screwed up!
> Confused,
> Deidre
